rows.label: tlk43310148_01_msg0001
rows.name: Nice. A Driver and a Blade.

rows.label: tlk43310148_01_msg0003
rows.name:
A Driver's characteristics are affected
by their Blades or, strictly speaking,
the weapons the Blades have, y'know.

rows.label: tlk43310148_01_msg0004
rows.name:
If you've got, say, two with Megalances
by your side, that gives you the class
of Elite Fighter.

rows.label: tlk43310148_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Or if you've got one with a Bitball and
one with a Shield Hammer, then you're
a Knight.

rows.label: tlk43310148_01_msg0006
rows.name:
A good Driver tries out all kinds of
different combinations and figures out
what works best with what.
